message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money. This offer won't last.
Considering the inflation, this is a fair deal.
Okay, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
You're getting anxious, I can tell. This is the best you'll get.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  You're pushing me to the limit here. This offer is my bottom line. Take it, or I'm going all-in on the next round.
I'm not buying the threat. You're running out of time.
